name: His Children
description:
It's all father's fault, regardless of his tears. 

You are stuck in a procedurally generated liminal space, a space between spaces. 

Mechanics:

  • Avoid his eyes at all costs 
  • Harvest his their smiles
  • Bring the smiles back to the children
  • mind the clock, you don't wanna be stuck in there forever

   Warning:

  • If you bring his smiles back to the children successfully he will create a new space and there will be more of him

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
